scripts.demos:all: npm run demos:generate && npm run demos:validate
scripts.docs:all: npm run demos:generate && npm run demos:validate && npm run docs:generate --workspace=docs && npm run generate-code-map --workspace=docs
scripts.site:build: npm run ui:build && npm run docs:all && npm run build-web --workspace=docs
scripts.docs:baseline: npm run build-web --workspace=docs && npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts
scripts.verify:packages: npm run lint --workspace=ui && npm run test --workspace=ui && npm run lint --workspace=charts && npm run test --workspace=charts
scripts.verify:packages:build: npm run build --workspace=ui && npm run build --workspace=charts
scripts.release: npm run verify:packages && npm run verify:packages:build && npm run ui:build && tsx scripts/publish-release.ts
